name: Monkey D. Luffy
text:
Once per turn, this character cannot be K.O'd by your opponent's effects.
When Attacking: You may place 3 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, if your opponent has 5 or more cards in their hand, your opponent trashes 1 card from their hand.
